A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson turned Luke Skywalker into a selfish crusty old man. The Luke Skywalker in TLJ is not the true Luke Skywalker of the Star Wars universe. Rian clearly doesn't care about the fans\, characters\, and history of Star Wars. It doesn't seem like he even watched the previous films. Besides Luke\, the story was terrible\, it  had stupid jokes(JarJarBinks cringe worthy)\, SJW cast\, and major plot holes. Truth is\, all Rian cared about was making money.
